abstract: Clones of the ABC soap opera “Desperate Housewives” have become breakout hits in South America. Now Disney is signing deals to produce local versions of two other series, “Grey’s Anatomy” and “Brothers & Sisters,” in other countries as well.
lead_paragraph: Clones of the ABC soap opera “Desperate Housewives” have become breakout hits in South America. Now Disney is signing deals to produce local versions of two other series, “Grey’s Anatomy” and “Brothers & Sisters,” in other countries as well.

headline.main: ABC Exports Two Dramas to Colombia
